amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress on the implementation of the Asia Reassurance Initiative Act of 2018 with respect to Taiwan arms sales.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2241 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2241 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Gardner to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4189-4190) To express the sense of Congress on the implementation of the Asia Reassurance Initiative Act of 2018 with respect to Taiwan arms sales.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2241 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Gardner to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2241 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
